item.title: X-Mooks GM Guide
item.description: Here’s some notes on GMing and helpful rollable tables to help with GMing.

item.title: X-Mooks Rules
item.description:
X-Mooks is my homebrew OSR-compatible rule system which is HEAVILY based on:

  • Many Rats on a Stick by Skerples. PDF. If there’s something missing here, namely Wizard Schools, refer to that document to find some, if nothing speaks to you there refer to the Extra Resources section for more options.

item.title: X-Mooks Setting
item.description: Here’s some notes on the default setting X-Mooks, Golgea.
